---
title: "Day 23"
---

[Day 23 challenge](https://adventofcode.com/2024/day/23)

Setup:

```{r setup_day23}
library("tidyverse")

fn1 <- function(data_in) {
  ans <- data_in |>
    mutate(first = stringr::str_extract(X1, "^[a-z]+"),
           second = stringr::str_remove(str_extract(X1, "-[a-z]+$"), "-"))
}
```

Part1 example:

```{r day23_part1_example}
ans <- fn1(read_fwf("../data/day23_01_example.txt"))
ans
# print(cat("Part1 example A: ", ans, "\n"))
```
